1. 二元关系 Binary Relations

A 二元关系(binary relation) RRR from a set AAA to a set BBB is a subset of A×BA\times BA×B.

  • “A binary relation RRR” is a set.
  • R⊆A×BR\subseteq A\times BR⊆A×B
  • R={(a,b)∣a∈A,b∈B,a  R  b}R=\{(a,b)\mid a\in A, b\in B, a\;R\;b\}R={(a,b)∣a∈A,b∈B,aRb}.
  • “A relation on set AAA” means a relation from set AAA to itself.

Question: How many binary relations are there on a set AAA with nnn elements?

2n22^{n^2}2n2

1.1. Methods of Representation

1.1.1. By Connection Matrices

举个例子，RRR 是一个二元关系，表示两个集合中按位或不为零的对：

可以通过连接矩阵(connection matrix) 表示二元关系：

1.1.2. By Directed Graph

A 有向图(directed graph = digraph) consists of a set VVV of vertices together with a set EEE of ordered pairs of elements of VVV called edges(or arcs).

The vertices a,ba,ba,b is called the initial and terminal vertices of the edge (a,b)(a,b)(a,b), respectively.

1.2. Properties of Binary Relations

1.2.1. 自反性 Reflexive

A relation RRR on a set AAA is 自反性(reflexive) if

∀x(x∈A→(x,x)∈R)\forall x (x\in A\rightarrow (x,x)\in R)∀x(x∈A→(x,x)∈R)

1.2.2. 非自反性 Irreflexive

A relation RRR on a set AAA is 非自反性(irreflexive) if

∀x(x∈A→(x,x)∉R)\forall x (x\in A\rightarrow (x,x)\not\in R)∀x(x∈A→(x,x)∈R)

1.2.3. 对称性 Symmetric

A relation RRR on a set AAA is 对称性(symmetric) if

∀x∀y((x,y)∈R→(y,x)∈R)\forall x\forall y((x,y)\in R\rightarrow (y,x)\in R)∀x∀y((x,y)∈R→(y,x)∈R)

1.2.4. 反对称性 Antisymmetric

A relation RRR on a set AAA is 反对称性(antisymmetric) if

∀x∀y((x,y)∈R∧(y,x)∈R→x=y)\forall x \forall y((x,y)\in R \land (y,x)\in R\rightarrow x=y)∀x∀y((x,y)∈R∧(y,x)∈R→x=y)
  • If there is an arc from xxx to yyy there cannot be one from yyy to xxx if x≠yx\neq yx=y.

1.2.5. 非对称性 Asymmetric

A relation RRR on a set AAA is 非对称性(asymmetric) if

∀x∀y((x,y)∈R→¬((y,x)∈R))\forall x \forall y ((x,y) \in R \rightarrow \lnot ((y,x)\in R))∀x∀y((x,y)∈R→¬((y,x)∈R))

1.2.6. 传递性 Transitive

A relation RRR on a set AAA is 传递性(transitive) if

∀x∀y∀z((x,y)∈R∧(y,z)∈R→(x,z)∈R)\forall x \forall y \forall z ((x,y)\in R \land (y,z)\in R \rightarrow (x,z)\in R)∀x∀y∀z((x,y)∈R∧(y,z)∈R→(x,z)∈R)
  • If there is an arc from xxx to yyy and one from yyy to zzz, then there must be one from xxx to zzz.

Discussion Question

Is a relation RRR is reflexive if it is symmetric and transitive?

Yet a wrong proof

(a,b)∈R(a,b) \in R(a,b)∈R and RRR is symmetric implys (b,a)∈R(b,a) \in R(b,a)∈R.

(a,b)∈R(a,b) \in R(a,b)∈R, (b,a)∈R(b,a)\in R(b,a)∈R and RRR is transitive (a,a)∈R(a,a) \in R(a,a)∈R.

Which means that RRR is reflexive.

Incorrect. Because it cannot be guaranteed that for all a∈Sa \in Sa∈S, there exists a bbb such that (a,b)∈R(a,b)\in R(a,b)∈R. Therefore, there might exist such an a∈Ra\in Ra∈R for which there is no relation concerning aaa."

1.3. 组合关系 Combining Relations

因为定义在集合 A,BA, BA,B 上的任意关系 RRR 是 A×BA\times BA×B 的子集，我们可以对关系定义任意组合运算。

1.3.1. 集合运算 Set Operations

定义在关系上的集合运算可以直接类比集合。

Let A={a1,a2,⋯ ,an}A=\{a_1,a_2,\cdots,a_n\}A={a1​,a2​,⋯,an​}, B={b1,b2,⋯ ,bn}B=\{b_1,b_2,\cdots,b_n\}B={b1​,b2​,⋯,bn​}, MR1=[cij]M_{R_1} = [c_{ij}]MR1​​=[cij​], MR2=[di,j]M_{R_2}=[d_{i,j}]MR2​​=[di,j​], the set operations of two relations are defined by

MR1∪R2=[cij∨dij]=MR1∨MR2MR1∩R2=[cij∧dij]=MR1∧MR2MR1‾=[cij‾]MR1−R2=MR1∩R2‾=[cij∧dij‾]\begin{aligned} M_{R_1 \cup R_2} &= [c_{ij} \lor d_{ij}] = M_{R_1} \lor M_{R_2} \\ M_{R_1 \cap R_2} &= [c_{ij} \land d_{ij}] = M_{R_1} \land M_{R_2}\\ M_{\overline{R_1}}&=[\overline{c_{ij}}]\\ M_{R_1-R_2} &= M_{R_1\cap \overline{R_2}} = [c_{ij} \land \overline{d_{ij}}]\\ \end{aligned}MR1​∪R2​​MR1​∩R2​​MR1​​​MR1​−R2​​​=[cij​∨dij​]=MR1​​∨MR2​​=[cij​∧dij​]=MR1​​∧MR2​​=[cij​​]=MR1​∩R2​​​=[cij​∧dij​​]​

1.3.2. 关系合成 Composition of Relations

对于关系 R={(a,b)∣a∈A,b∈B,aRb}R=\{(a,b)\mid a\in A,b\in B,aRb\}R={(a,b)∣a∈A,b∈B,aRb} 和关系 S={(b,c)∣b∈B,c∈C,bSc}S=\{(b,c)\mid b\in B, c\in C, bSc\}S={(b,c)∣b∈B,c∈C,bSc}，定义 SSS 与 RRR 的合成关系(the composite of RRR and SSS) 为：

S∘R={(a,c)∣a∈A∧c∈C∧∃b(b∈B∧aRb∧bSc)}S \circ R =\{(a,c)\mid a\in A \land c\in C \land \exists b(b\in B\land aRb \land bSc)\}S∘R={(a,c)∣a∈A∧c∈C∧∃b(b∈B∧aRb∧bSc)}
  • 关系合成运算满足结合律：(R∘Q)∘S=R∘(Q∘S)(R\circ Q)\circ S = R \circ (Q \circ S)(R∘Q)∘S=R∘(Q∘S)。

于此我们还可以定义关系的幂运算(the power of relation)：

Let RRR be a relation on the set AAA. The powers Rn, n=1,2,3,…R^n,\,n=1,2,3,\ldotsRn,n=1,2,3,…, are defined recursively by

R1=R, and Rn+1=Rn∘RR^1=R,\text{ and }R^{n+1}=R^n\circ RR1=R, and Rn+1=Rn∘R

Theorem

The relation RRR on a set AAA is transitive if and only if Rn⊆R, n=1,2,3,…R^n \subseteq R,\, n=1,2,3,\ldotsRn⊆R,n=1,2,3,….

Proof

(1) ∀n(Rn⊆R)⇒R is transitive\forall n (R^n\subseteq R) \Rightarrow R \text{ is transitive}∀n(Rn⊆R)⇒R is transitive

(a,b)∈R(a,b)\in R(a,b)∈R，(b,c)∈R(b,c)\in R(b,c)∈R，故 (a,b)∈R2(a,b)\in R^2(a,b)∈R2；由于 R2⊆RR^2\subseteq RR2⊆R，可以得到 (a,c)∈R(a,c)\in R(a,c)∈R，故 R is transitiveR\text{ is transitive}R is transitive。

(2) R is transitive⇒∀n(Rn⊆R)R\text{ is transitive} \Rightarrow \forall n (R^n \subseteq R)R is transitive⇒∀n(Rn⊆R)

使用数学归纳法，对于所有 (a,b)∈Rn+1=Rn∘R(a,b)\in R^{n+1}=R^n\circ R(a,b)∈Rn+1=Rn∘R，那么 (a,x)∈Rn⊆R, (x,b)∈R(a,x)\in R^n\subseteq R,\ (x,b)\in R(a,x)∈Rn⊆R, (x,b)∈R 且 RRR 有传递性可以推出 (a,b)∈R(a,b)\in R(a,b)∈R。

1.3.3. 逆关系 Inverse Relations

对于定义在集合 AAA 到 BBB 上的关系 R={(a,b)∣a∈A,b∈B,aRb}R=\{(a,b)\mid a\in A,b\in B,aRb\}R={(a,b)∣a∈A,b∈B,aRb}，我们可以定义 BBB 到 AAA 的逆关系(the inverse relation from BBB to AAA)：

R−1={(b,a)∣(a,b)∈R,a∈A,b∈B}R^{-1} = \{(b,a) \mid (a,b)\in R ,a\in A,b\in B\}R−1={(b,a)∣(a,b)∈R,a∈A,b∈B}
